question: I was diagnosed with diabetes about 4yrs ago and have been managing it with diet, but this last week my blood sugar levels have been high and i have had a  minty taste in my mouth and tingling around the mouth and in my hands.  I told the doctor once before about the minty taste but did not get an answer why i have it.  I was wondering if the diabetes can cause this minty taste and tingling around the mouth?
title: minty taste and numbness in face and hands
